dialog.title: Manage Permissions
dialog.description: Grant or revoke extension permissions. Please note that some features may be disabled without the necessary permissions.

energySaving.title: Energy Saving Mode
energySaving.description: Reduce the extension sensitivity to changes on the page
energySaving.note: (Existing tabs require a refresh to apply)

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.description: Go through the onboarding experience again

dialog.title: Import Data
dialog.description: Current settings will be overridden or merged depending on the version of which the data is exported from

export.title: Export
export.description: Download extension's data as a file

dialog.title: Clear All Data
dialog.description: Are you sure you want to clear all extension data? This action cannot be undone and will wipe the following data:

items.customData: All custom themes, code blocks rules, etc.
items.otherData: And any other data stored by the extension

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Allow the extension to sync settings with your Perplexity.ai preferences. Also used to identify your Supporter status.
